mapper.select: select id, username, password, phone, enabled, lastPasswordResetDate, createDate, modifyDate, authority as roles from user a left join authority b on a.id = b.userId
select id, username, password, phone, enabled, lastPasswordResetDate, createDate, modifyDate, authority as roles from user a left join authority b on a.id = b.userId where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into user (id, username, password, phone, enabled, lastPasswordResetDate, createDate, modifyDate) values (#{id}, #{username}, #{password}, #{phone}, #{enabled}, #{lastPasswordResetDate}, #{createDate}, #{modifyDate})
